The scheme will increase the technological threshold of the Armed Forces by inducting technically qualified and trained individuals from ITis and other institutes: Centre to Delhi High Court on #Agnipath Scheme

With new military technologies emerging at a rapid pace, the time tested conventional formations of the armed forces were losing their edge. This made structural changes in overall organisation of the Indian armed forces a matter of necessity: Centre #Agnipath

Defending Indian territory from external and internal threats requires an agile, youthful and technologically adept Armed Forces. To re-structure the 'intake & retention' processes in the three Services, Agnipath was promulgated: Centre to Delhi High Court on #Agnipath Scheme https://t.co/VeQ0AbMJD7
